extension.name: GCalendar Overview
extension.author: G4J Project
extension.copyright: This extension is released under the GNU/GPL License.
extension.description: This module shows the google calendar at a module position.

field.name: weekstart
field.label: Week starts on
field.description: The starting day of the week in the calendar.

field.name: titleformat_month
field.label: Title format month
field.description: The format of the title in the month view.

field.name: timeformat_month
field.label: Time format month
field.description: The format of the time in the month view.

field.name: event_color
field.label: Event Color
field.description: The color of the days with events.

field.name: theme
field.label: Theme
field.description: Define the JQuery theme (install it in the folder components/com_gcalendar/libraries/jquery/themes).

field.name: gc_cache
field.label: Caching
field.description: Select whether to cache the content of this module.

field.name: gc_cache_time
field.label: Cache Time
field.description: The time before the module is recached in sec.
